quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First of all, you could, like, move west. With that accomplished, go to the south. And then, take a trip south. With that done, venture west. And then, go to the south. That done, attempt to travel west. And then, make an attempt to head north. Okay, and then, head north. After that, attempt to move east. After that, retrieve the laptop from the bed stand. Once that's all handled, you can stop!

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bedchamber. The room is well lit.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a bed stand. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the bed stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed stand.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchen. You start to take note of what's in the room.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You are in a playroom. A typical one.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Of every dish-pit you could have sauntered into, you had to saunter into a standard one.

 You can make out [if c_1 is locked]a locked[else if c_1 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] refrigerator.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_1]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You're now in a recreation zone. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You see a mantle. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the mantle.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookhouse.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a TextWorld limited edition safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The TextWorld limited edition safe contains [a list of things in the c_2]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The TextWorld limited edition safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a plate. The plate is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the plate you see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] The plate appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You've entered a cubicle. The room is well lit.

 You see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. A normal one.

 You can make out a coffer![if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_4]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The coffer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
Of every garage you could have shown up in, you had to saunter into a normal one.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. An usual one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You've entered a bar. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a shower. An ordinary one. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You see a cabinet.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The cabinet is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. Let's see what's in here.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You've entered a pantry. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can make out a rack. [if there is something on the s_3]On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_3]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]The rack appears to be empty.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.desc:

 You make out a American locker.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The American locker contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The American locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You arrive in a spare room. An ordinary kind of place.

 Hey, want to see a type 7 box? Look over there, a type 7 box.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The type 7 box contains [a list of things in the c_7]. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type 7 box is empty![end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a spherical chest.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The spherical chest contains [a list of things in the c_8]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The spherical chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

You've entered a laundromat. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.desc:
You find yourself in a basement. A normal one. You begin looking for stuff.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading south. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to venture west. With that over with, make an effort to travel south. Then, make an effort to head south. That done, take a trip west. After that, go south. Then, attempt to venture west. Then, make an effort to venture north. And then, try to go north. That done, make an effort to take a trip east. And then, recover the laptop from the bed stand in the bedchamber. And once you've done that, you win!
